name: reels_downloader
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_reels_and_post_downloader.
Tool description: Download instagram reels and post uing API
API description: You only need to provide the link to your Instagram media, and our API will give you the results in Download links of reels and posts

link.description: The URL of the Instagram media (reel or post) to be downloaded.
